snippet: “The Legend of Apsara Mera,” by the Royal Ballet of Cambodia at the Brooklyn Academy of Music, showcases a form and a story that are steeped in religious worship, utmost politeness and order.
abstract: Alastair Macaulay reviews national premiere of dance piece The Legend of Apsara Mera, choreographed by Princess Norodom Buppha Devi and performed by Royal Ballet of Cambodia at Brooklyn Academy of Music.
lead_paragraph: “The Legend of Apsara Mera,” by the Royal Ballet of Cambodia at the Brooklyn Academy of Music, showcases a form and a story that are steeped in religious worship, utmost politeness and order.

headline.seo: Royal Ballet of Cambodia at Brooklyn Academy of Music
headline.main: All of This Restraint in the Service of Beauty
headline.print_headline: All of This Restraint In the Service of Beauty
